text: @realDonaldTrump @Twitter There is no proof in what your saying. If your talking about the Republican Party cheating and got caught with the ballots. And yes you’re right we got a watch the Republicans in the mail and building we need mail in voting to keep us safe it’s not gonna change. Covid-19 is here

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
